verses.roman:
eta jāni' tāṅra bhikṣā kailā aṅgīkāra
vāsā-niṣṭhā kailā candraśekharera ghara

synonyms: eta jāni'—on this understanding; tāṅra—his; bhikṣā—lunch; kailā aṅgīkāra—He accepted; vāsā-niṣṭhā—residence; kailā—made; candraśekharera ghara—the house of Candraśekhara.
translation: With this understanding, Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu agreed to accept lunch at the place of Tapana Miśra. The Lord made His residence at the home of Candraśekhara.
